column2: After 1000 years we finally have subjugated the Saxons! Now we can finally unite our two realms under one flag, the Angevin Empire! Long live the Emperor!

The French people are oppressed by themselves! Those old, foolish dukes refuse to allow their subjects to join our splendid empire. We must liberate them from those disgruntled idiots so that they can finally be free!

We control the lands of Englaland, but we lack the knowledge of how many people and what kind of infrastructure there is. We will remedy this by commisioning a grand survey of all our lands and introducing a more fair taxation system.
